chess

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class Piece defines the common properties of a chess piece

      • canPlacePiece

        public abstract boolean canPlacePiece(int currRow,
                                      int currCol,
                                      int tarRow,
                                      int tarCol)
        The abstract method to implement how a piece moves
        Parameters:
        currRow - the row that the current piece is on
        currCol - the column that the current piece is on
        tarRow - the row that the current piece wants to move on
        tarCol - the column that the current piece wants to move on
        Returns:
        true or false whether a piece can move accordindly the rule of chess
